name: Joby
description: Joby is a web app that can help you track your applied jobs, and record your career timeline. Although I am a frontend developer, it is always good to know other fields, isn't it? That is why I gave the backend world a try. Joby is my first ever app handling both frontend and backend on my own using SvelteKit, Tailwind, Express and MongoDB.

name: Paing Mentoring Family
description:
Ko Aung Myo Paing is a venture capitalist and financial advisor. His mission is to help families achieve financial freedom by sharing his experiences and knowledge as a family advisor.

The goal of this project is to develop a credible website that reflects the mission of Ko Aung Myo Paing. The website needs to showcase the experiences of Ko Aung Myo Paing, Catalog his webinars and function as a blog.

Within 2 months, we defined the brand image of Ko Aung Myo Paing, designed and developed the website using Figma, Adobe Suite, Webflow and Webflow CMS.

name: APM Help
description:
APM Help is your go-to place for property management accounting and maintenance experts. Whether it's rental property management, bookkeeping support, training, bank reconciliations, or emergencies - they got you cover. They also offer 30-minute FREE consultation.

We, proudly, designed and development a fully responsive and modern-looking business website for AMP Help using Webflow. Unlike WordPress, Webflow Hosting is pretty strong - the website still performs well even with over 12 pages, and over hundreds of blog posts. Again, with the help of easy-to-use Webflow CMS, they can update the content, and maintain blog posts quickly whenever they want without relying on any developer.

And special thanks to Ma Htet Htet Lynn Naing who is taking part in current rebranding process for new logo, colors, and layout designs.

name: Kyaw San Htoo Pharmacy
description:
Kyaw San Htoo is a pharmacy that has been running for over a decade in Pathein.

We designed a reliable logo which stands out among the competitions. For the next part, we designed a website that can provide accurate information about medicines, ensure availability for the customers and offer a contentful and representative digital experience for the residents of Pathein.

We also collaborated with Bro Ye Min Htun, who is current working as a ux designer @ Codigo.
